title: Elite Knowledge Engineering
subtitle: Designed for sectors where misinterpretation is not an option.
f1_desc: Interact with your manuals in natural language. Get expert and precise answers with direct references to the source document.
f2_desc: Native understanding of blueprints, electrical schemes, and complex diagrams with Gemini 2.0/3. Automatic component identification.
f3_desc: Automatic de-identification engine that protects emails, phones, and IDs before processing with AI. Data privacy by design.
f4_desc: Knowledge Graph (Neo4j) infrastructure to navigate complex technical relationships between components and procedures.
f5_desc: Robust asynchronous processing via BullMQ. Track heavy document analysis progress in real-time with automatic self-healing retries.
f6_desc: Proactive detection of workflow anomalies. Automatic alerts for error or latency spikes and server-side PDF technical reporting.
f7_desc: Create complex workflows with decision nodes (Switch/Case), delays (Wait), and iterations (Loop) through an intuitive visual editor.
f8_desc: 'Mission Control' execution logs panel to follow every step of your automations live, with detailed performance metrics.
f9_desc: Governance with human validation. Manage critical workflow escalations with industrial-grade audit traceability.
f10_desc: Automatic domain detection (Legal, Insurance, Healthcare) with dynamic analysis logic adaptation.
f11_desc: Streaming ingestion and intelligent deduplication to manage unlimited technical libraries without overhead.
f12_desc: Agentic loop that assesses juror feedback to refine hallucinated or incomplete responses with causal reasoning.
f13_desc: Structural compliance guaranteed. Automated multi-cluster routing (AUTH, LOGS, MAIN) to prevent cross-tenant leaks.
f14_desc: Dynamic report generation with full traceability, multi-language (ES/EN) support, and business-ready professional terminology.
f15_desc: Circuit breaker protection that ensures system availability even during critical failures of payment gateways or external services.
